other_tests.findings: The patient developed papillary squamous-cell carcinoma of the glans penis.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Upon recurrence of the lesion, patient underwent distal penectomy.

other_tests.findings: Dementia work-ups reveal no treatable problem, confirming suspicion of probable Alzheimer disease.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Patient's dementia progressed; he mistook the doctor for a niece during a visit.

other_tests.findings: The patient developed pleural effusions and severe desquamating dermatitis.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Patient's condition was treatable but sapping.
